scripts.build: tsc && node esbuild.config.js && npm run copy-schemas
scripts.build:debug: tsc && DR_TELEMETRY=true node esbuild.config.js && npm run copy-schemas
scripts.test: bun test --concurrent tests/unit/core/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/validators/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/telemetry/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/utils/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/coding-agents/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/integrations/**/*.test.ts tests/compatibility/**/*.test.ts --test-name-pattern '^(?!BaseIntegrationManager)' ; bun test tests/unit/chat/*.test.ts tests/integration/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:unit: bun test --concurrent tests/unit/core/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/validators/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/telemetry/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/utils/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/coding-agents/**/*.test.ts tests/unit/integrations/**/*.test.ts --test-name-pattern '^(?!BaseIntegrationManager)' ; bun test tests/unit/chat/*.test.ts
scripts.test:coverage:ci: bun test --concurrent --coverage --coverage-reporter=lcov tests/**/*.test.ts --test-name-pattern '^(?!BaseIntegrationManager)' ; bun test --coverage --coverage-reporter=lcov tests/unit/integrations/base-manager.test.ts && node scripts/validate-coverage-threshold.js
scripts.test:fast-track: bun test tests/unit/**/*.test.ts tests/integration/add-*.test.ts tests/integration/delete-*.test.ts tests/integration/validate-*.test.ts
